For sale is are these 2 Fatima T222's, both graded by SGC. All have good contrast, sharp images and better eye appeal than the given grades.

Leach...$150...SGC 30, crisp image, good centering, clean back, creases.

Benton....$SOLD... SGC A, trimmed?, clean back, lower image surface wear/crazing. 

Vitt....$SOLD... SGC10, crisp image, good contrast, creases, minor rear scrapbook residue.

Lapp.....$SOLD....SGC 40, couple creases, good contrast, clean back.

Hamilton.....$SOLD....SGC A, shortprint, corner clipped, creases, good contrast & sharpe image, couple small toning spots on reverse. 

Price includes shipping. Payment via Paypal 'Gift' or price plus 3% for regular Paypal ONLY. Please PM me to buy or with questions. Thanks.........Matt
I'll take Vitt please. Sending PM
